Check the browser console and network tabs for more information. ## Does the console show the error "No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header"? This means the server that hosts your file does not allow requests from other sites (cross-origin requests, or CORS). You need to move the asset to a server that allows cross-origin file downloads.
